channel.title: McKinley County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in McKinley County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 63
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 63 - NM-412/Prewitt.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 53
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 53 - NM-371/NM-612/Thoreau.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 47
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 47 - Continental Divide. I-40 crosses the Continental Divide here, between the Colorado River drainage (west) and the Rio Grande drainage (east).

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 47
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 47 - Continental Divide/Historic US-66 Route.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 44
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 44 - Coolidge.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 39
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 39 - Refinery. Exit here for the Gallup Refinery.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 36
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 36 - Iyanbito.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 33
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 33 - NM-400/McGaffey.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 33
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 33 - NM-400/McGaffey.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/East Gallup. This is the eastern end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 22
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 22 - Miyamura Drive/Montoya Blvd.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching I-40/NM-602
item.description: US-491 south approaching I-40 to Albuquerque and Flagstaff (Arizona). US-491 ends at I-40, and turns into NM-602 towards Zuni.

item.title: US-491 South at NM-264
item.description: US-491 south at NM-264. Use left lane for US-491 south; right lane for NM-264 west.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching NM-264
item.description: US-491 south approaching NM-264 west to Window Rock.

item.title: NM-53 West - Black Rock Jct.
item.description: NM-53 at Black Rock jct. Turn right for Black Rock. Continue west on NM-53 for Zuni.

item.title: End NM-602 South at NM-53
item.description: End NM-602 South at NM-53. Use NM-53 west for Zuni; NM-53 east for Ramah.

item.title: End NM-602 South At NM-53
item.description: End NM-602 South at NM-53. Use NM-53 west for Zuni; use NM-53 east for Ramah and Fence Lake.

item.title: NM-602 South Approaching NM-53
item.description: NM-602 south approaching NM-53.

item.title: NM-602 South at Zuni-4
item.description: NM-602 south at Zuni-4 south. At the time of this photograph, Zuni-4 was closed for bridge repair, so the guide sign was turned upside town. During normal times, use Zuni-4 south for Zuni and St. John. Continue south on NM-602 for Ramah and Grants.

item.title: NM-602 South - Entering Zuni Reservation
item.description: Entering Zuni Reservation on NM-602 south.

item.title: NM-602 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-602 south to Zuni, and El Morro National Monument.

item.title: NM-602 South - Vanderwagen
item.description: NM-602 south at the small settlement of Vanderwagen. Turn right for the Post Office.

item.title: NM-602 South at Jones Ranch Road
item.description: NM-602 south at Jones Ranch Road jct. to Jones Ranch and Chichiltah.

item.title: NM-602 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-602 south to Zuni, and Ramah.

item.title: NM-602 South Approaching NM-564
item.description: NM-602 south approaching NM-564. Turn right to continue south on NM-602. NM-564 is the eastern belt route around Gallup.

item.title: NM-118 West at NM-602/US-491
item.description: NM-118 west at Arnold St., to NM-602/Zuni/Ramah and US-491/Shiprock.

item.title: NM-118 West - Downtown Gallup
item.description: NM-118 west in Downtown Gallup.

item.title: I-40 East Exit 26 offramp at NM-118
item.description: I-40 east Exit 26 offramp at NM-118/BL-40. NM-118 is the route of former US-66.

item.title: I-40 East Offramp at BL-40/NM-118
item.description: I-40 east offramp at BL-40/NM-118. Use NM-118 east for Army Depot. Rehoboth, and and Red Rock Park.

item.title: I-40 East at Exit 26 Offramp
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 Offramp. Turn right for State Police; turn left for Gallup and Hospital.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/East Gallup. This is the eastern end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/E. 66 Ave. The actual exit text is for East Gallup.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 22
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 22 - Miyamura Drive/Montoya Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 20
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 20 - Downtown Gallup. The advance signs to Exit 20 are much more detailed then the actual exit name, which is Munoz Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 20
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 20 - US-491/NM-602/Shiprock/Zuni. The advance signs to Exit 20 are much more detailed then the actual exit name, which is Munoz Blvd.

item.title: NM-118 East at I-40 East Onramp
item.description: NM-118 east at I-40 east onramp, at Exit 16. Use I-40 east for Albuquerque.

item.title: BL-40/NM-118 West at I-40 West
item.description: BL-40/NM-118 west at I-40 west to Flagstaff. This is the western end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 16 - BL-40/NM-118/West Gallup.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 16 - NM-118/BL-40/West Gallup. Use Exit 16 for BL-40/West Gallup/Historic US-66 Route.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 16 - BL-40/NM-118/West Gallup.

item.title: Distance Marker on I-40 East
item.description: Distance marker on I-40 east. Distance to US-491, Gallup, and Albuquerque.

item.title: NM-118 East
item.description: NM-118 East in rural McKinley County.

item.title: NM-118 West at I-40 East
item.description: NM-118 west at I-40 east (Exit 8) onramp. Continue west on NM-118 for westbound I-40 access.

item.title: NM-118 West
item.description: NM-118 west shield, just west of I-40 (Exit 8) onramps. This sign is been spray painted, as has many other signs in the Gallup area.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 8
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 8. Eastbound, Exit 8 has no advanced signage, just the Exit 8 gore sign. Westbound, Exit 8 is signed as Manuelito/Defiance. Exit 8 is the first New Mexico exit eastbound on I-40. This exit connects to NM-118, which serves as a frontage road to I-40.

item.title: I-40 East - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker inside New Mexico on I-40 eastbound. Distance to Gallup, Grants, and Albuquerque.

item.title: I-40 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on I-40 eastbound.
